## About this site

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(animation)

saveGIF({
  for (i in 1:10) {
    plot(runif(10), runif(10), pch=19, col=rainbow(10), 
         xlim=c(0,1), ylim=c(0,1), main="Welcome!")
    Sys.sleep(0.2)
  }
}, movie.name = "landing_animation.gif", interval = 0.2, ani.width = 400, ani.height = 300)
